actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill, H.R. 2337, to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims a bill for the relief of named Indian tribes. Directs the Commissioner to report to the House of Representatives on the nature of the claim against the United States and the amount, if any, due such tribes from the United States.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill, H.R. 2337, to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.
